thread.title: 100+ people injured as train coaches collide in Pretoria | News24
thread.title_full: 100+ people injured as train coaches collide in Pretoria | News24

title: 100+ people injured as train coaches collide in Pretoria | News24
text:
100+ people injured as train coaches collide in Pretoria 2017-02-20 20:31 Jeanette Chabalala, News24 (File) Carriages gutted as train goes up in flames in Cape Town 
Pretoria - More than 100 people were injured in a train accident in Rossyln train station in Pretoria.Spokesperson for Best Care Ambulance Services Xander Loubser who is on scene said the incident happened when two coaches collided. “About 90% of the patients are slightly injured and 20% are in a serious condition,” Loubser said. No fatalities reported. Pretoria police were on their way to the scene. More to follow. Read more on: pretoria | transport | accidents Join the conversation!
